description: Ship Physics Configuration Presets - All 10 documented ship archetypes

configs.Description: Fast and agile combat ship with excellent maneuverability
configs.Notes: Best for: Combat, racing, precision flying. Requires skill to master.

configs.Description: Massive cargo hauler with powerful thrust and high stability
configs.Notes: Best for: Cargo missions, stable flight, beginners. Very forgiving.

configs.Description: Well-rounded ship suitable for all mission types
configs.Notes: Best for: Exploration, all-purpose missions, learning. Default starter ship.

configs.Description: Maximum velocity racing ship with minimal flight assistance
configs.Notes: Best for: Racing, time trials, speed runs. Very difficult to control.

configs.Description: Heavily armored assault ship with devastating firepower
configs.Notes: Best for: Heavy combat, assault missions. Nearly invincible but very slow.

configs.Description: Fast-response combat ship designed for pursuit missions
configs.Notes: Best for: Fast combat, pursuit, interception. Between Light Fighter and Racing Ship.

configs.Description: Reconnaissance ship with low signature and precise handling
configs.Notes: Best for: Reconnaissance, stealth missions, exploration. Quiet and methodical.

configs.Description: Heavy weapons platform designed for anti-capital ship combat
configs.Notes: Best for: Anti-capital ship, bombing runs. Powerful but ponderous.

configs.Description: Safe and stable passenger transport with maximum comfort
configs.Notes: Best for: Passenger transport, VIP missions. Safe, stable, comfortable.

configs.Description: Reliable utility workhorse for repair and resupply missions
configs.Notes: Best for: Team support, repair, cargo. Reliable and versatile.
